main event: A red and green star-shaped object was seen blinking and stationary for two hours in Newberryport.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime at arm's length., The sighting lasted for a total of two hours., The object was reported as visible both on the ground and in the air., The blinking of the object was noted as potentially indicating the planet Venus., The observation involved the use of binoculars by a seamen apprentice.
sighted object: one red and green star-shaped object
